text:
@ChristinaKTLA @GavinNewsom Because the Coronavirus is real but being used by demoncrats to try and scare people to vote by mail so they can CHEAT in the 2020 election .it is already happening in NJ with arrests being made. Don't be fooled by the dems about the virus spread. VOTE IN PERSON.
#TRUMP2020
